credit_line: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
title: Mourning sampler
provenance: Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin. Bought at Louis Allen, 1924.
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: embroidered and painted
description: Rectangular embroidered picture showing a tomb or memorial inscribed "RMG" under the shade of a willow. Embroidered in multi-colored silk on cream silk satin. Heavy chenille yarn is used for the grass. From the Balch School in Providence(?).
name: Mourning sampler
